snippet: The European Central Bank acknowledged the widespread economic concern on the Continent, but declined to change its main interest rate from 1 percent.
abstract: European Central Bank acknowledges the widespread economic concern on the Continent, but declines to change its main interest rate from 1 percent.

byline.contributor: David Jolly contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: The European Central Bank acknowledged the widespread economic concern on the Continent, but declined to change its main interest rate from 1 percent.

headline.seo: Europe’s Central Bank Leaves Interest Rate Unchanged
headline.main: Central Bank Leaves Rate Alone, Putting Pressure on Europe’s Leaders
headline.print_headline: Central Bank Leaves Rate Alone, Putting Pressure on Europe’s Leaders
